div.div: Mean annual ocean temperatures at standard depths of 50, 100, 200, and 400 m.
div.p: Data are from CMEMS TOPAZ4 Arctic Ocean Physics reanalysis at 12.5-km grid spacing, modeled from all available satellite and in situ observations between 1991 and 2015. The black line is the 100-km buffer offshore from the CAA coastline.
